ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: The course provides foundational statistical tools for quantitative research, and an introduction to using STATA. I would highly recommend the course with Prof Grieger.
A clear introduction to statistics for sociology. I would recommend this course and Prof. Grieger to any student interested in the material.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: The material I've learned from this course will be critical for any quantitative work I do for my dissertation. It has also helped me become a better consumer of academic literature.
